---
title: Getting started
---

Contracts that work on EVM-compatible blockchains should work on Arthera with minimal or no changes.

You can use your preferred EVM tools and libraries to start developing on Arthera:

- [**Hardhat**](./using-hardhat)
- [**Foundry**](https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry)
- [**Truffle**](https://trufflesuite.com/)
- [**Alchemy**](https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/alchemy-sdk-quickstart)
- [**Remix**](https://remix.ethereum.org/)

Arthera is also fully compatible with [**OpenZeppelin**](https://docs.openzeppelin.com/contracts/5.x/) libraries.

## Arthera Mainnet info

- **RPC Endpoint: `https://rpc.arthera.net`**
- **WebSocket Endpoint: `wss://ws.arthera.net`**
- **Chain ID: `10242`**
- **Explorer: https://explorer.arthera.net**
- **Wallet: https://wallet.arthera.net **
- **Subscription Faucet: https://faucet.arthera.net **
- **API Gateway**:
  - https://apigw.arthera.net

<AddMetamaskNetwork
  network={"mainnet"}
  title={"Add Arthera Mainnet to MetaMask"}
  size={"small"}
/>

## Arthera Testnet info

- **RPC Endpoint: `https://rpc-test2.arthera.net`**
- **WebSocket Endpoint: `wss://ws-test2.arthera.net`**
- **Chain ID: `10243`**
- **Explorers: https://explorer-test2.arthera.net**
- **Wallet: https://wallet-test.arthera.net **
- **Subscription Faucet: https://faucet-test.arthera.net **
- **API Gateway**:
  - https://apigw-test2.arthera.net
